website_summaries.verdict: This light is bolstered by its lightweight design and useful Bluetooth remote.
pros: The light is easy to use with three basic settings
It comes packaged with a Bluetooth remote that pairs easily to your phone and controls your device's camera
cons: It needs to be charged often, and it does't produce a very bright light

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, already broke after 3 days of use
customer_reviews.text: Fits on my Samsung Galaxy S8+ **without** the case, takes decent pictures, but the button on the actual light that turns the light off and on already broke! So I'm not able to use it anymore... I used it once or twice a day for 3 days and it broke already!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Received a replacement so I'm happy. Customer service is fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.text: The light is ok, although it covers most of the screen so it's hard to see when you're taking a picture. I cannot pair the remote to either my Nexus 5 phone or the iPad mini at all so the remote is basically worthless to me! Update (1/13/2018): The vendor contacted me and promptly sent a replacement. The new remote paired up with my android phone immediately and worked just fine. Again, I wish the ring light itself would be a little smaller though since it covers most of the screen so it's hard to see when you're taking a picture. Vendor's customer service couldn't be better. A++
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: ring light
customer_reviews.text: this product is the bomb! it has 3 levels of lighting and is so easy to use. just attach to your phone and turn on to desired brightness. how easy is that. it charges with a usb (included). thank you! I love it and will be recommending it to my girlfirends!!!
customer_reviews.author: Esther A.

customer_reviews.title: Love the remote shutter control
customer_reviews.text: OMG! Love this! Wish I had bought it sooner! The remote control for the shutter is super handy and fantastic to have 3 settings for the light - although even the lowest one is pretty bright! So far, great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: I love the remote control
customer_reviews.text: The bluetooth pairs up immediately on my iphone 8. I haven't tried out the light much, but seems to do a good job. I wish the light was smaller! I might update late after I've used it more.
customer_reviews.author: Athena Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Not very useful
customer_reviews.text: Slips off of phone easily & constantly. Also the brightness does nothing really. You’re better off just using whatever lighting you’re around.
customer_reviews.author: Christina & Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold charge very well but gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: Love the 3 different lighting options. Is VERY bright! Have to charge often and cord is short but I happen to have another longer one so I can leave it charging while clipped to the top of my iMac.
customer_reviews.author: KetoBeauties

customer_reviews.title: Great for nighttime pictures
customer_reviews.text: For my job I love how it helps nighttime pictures using my Galaxy s9Plus POP!
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Evans aka Maryee

customer_reviews.title: It’s Decent!
customer_reviews.text: I received what was described to me, yet it still wasn’t really what I wanted. Decent product, but it’s not exactly the type of lighting I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Private Shopper

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product
customer_reviews.text: The thing I love most about this product is the lighting it gives me when it’s dark or its a gloomy day. My pics come out so amazing! The thing I like least would be the remote that came with that I cannot keep up with lol
customer_reviews.author: Jelamaar

customer_reviews.title: Works nicely. Not my style
customer_reviews.text: Works nicely. Not my style, but not complaining either. The second light seems to work better with my smart phone and complexion. If you have a dark room, this will help your selfie

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my selfie obsessed niece and it was a hit! She said it is easy to use and she loves it.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it! I too see the difference in the pics with the use of this extra lighting. I'm looking forward to testing it out myself.

customer_reviews.title: Need to work out some bugs!!

product_meta.title: KobraTech Selfie Light Ring - MiLite Phone Ring Light iPhone & Android Compatible with Remote Shutter
feature_bullets: BRIGHTEN UP! Add the perfect amount of light in any situation. The MiLite Selfie Ring Light features 3 brightness levels, strobe mode and 36 LED light bulbs!
BONUS BLUETOOTH REMOTE – Only the MiLite Selfie Light includes a bonus Bluetooth Remote Shutter. So you can capture pictures and videos from up to 30 feet away!
NO MORE HAZY EFFECT - MiLite features a unique design that eliminates the dreaded “hazy effect”, unlike a cheaper phone ring light.

RECHARGEABLE – The MiLite Selfie Light is rechargeable, no need to find batteries. It’s also universally compatible with any smartphone. The perfect ring light for iPhone X, 8, 8 Plus, 7, Samsung Galaxy S9, S9+, Note 9 & more!
100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE - We’re so sure you’ll love your MiLite iPhone Ring Light, we even offer a full 2 year warranty!
